alert.note: Alert for Clear Creek; Gilpin; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 3:29PM MDT until July 28 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Gilpin County in central Colorado... Northeastern Clear Creek County in central Colorado... Northwestern Jefferson County in central Colorado... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 329 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Aspen Springs, or 29 miles west of Denver, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern Gilpin, northeastern Clear Creek and northwestern Jefferson Counties, including the following locations... Russell Gulch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
